title: Google\Cloud\Debugger\Daemon
name: Daemon
description: This class is responsible for registering itself as a Debuggee with the Stackdriver backend. It will fetch the list of breakpoints from the Stackdriver backend, validate and normalize them, and store them into the configured breakpoint storage.

params.name: options.sourceRoot
params.description: The full path to the source root. Defaults to the current working directory.

params.name: options.clientConfig
params.description: The options to instantiate the default DebuggerClient. Google\Cloud\Debugger\DebuggerClient::__construct() for the available options.

params.name: options.sourceContext
params.description: The source code identifier. Defaults to values autodetected from the environment.

params.name: options.extSourceContext
params.description: The source code identifier. Defaults to the $sourceContext option.

params.name: options.uniquifier
params.description: A string when uniquely identifies this debuggee. Defaults to a value autodetected from the environment.

params.name: options.description
params.description: A display name for the debuggee in the Stackdriver Debugger UI. Defaults to a value autodetected from the environment.

params.name: options.storage
params.description: The breakpoint storage mechanism to use. Defaults to a new SysvBreakpointStorage instance.

params.name: options.labels
params.description: A set of custom debuggee properties, populated by the agent, to be displayed to the user. Defaults to labels detected from the environment.

params.name: options.metadataProvider
params.description: Defaults to An automatically chosen provider, based on detected environment settings.

params.name: options.closureSerializer
params.description: An implementation responsible for serializing closures used in the $clientConfig. This is especially important when using the batch daemon. Defaults to Google\Cloud\Core\Batch\OpisClosureSerializer if the opis/closure library is installed.

params.name: options.register
params.description: Whether to start the worker in the background using the BatchRunner. Defaults to false.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Main loop for the daemon. Fetches breakpoints from the DebuggerClient and stores them in shared storage for the application to read. This function runs indefinitely.
